value.halfverse: and his mercy endures for ever.
value.verse: Give thanks to the LORD, for he is good, *
Let all those whom the LORD has redeemed proclaim *
value.halfverse: that he redeemed them from the hand of the foe.

from the east and from the west,
 from the north and from the south.
value.verse: He gathered them out of the lands; *

value.halfverse: they found no way to a city where they might dwell.
value.verse: Some wandered in desert wastes; *
They were hungry and thirsty; *
value.halfverse: their spirits languished within them.
and he delivered them from their distress.
value.verse: Then they cried to the LORD in their trouble, *

value.halfverse: to go to a city where they might dwell.
value.verse: He put their feet on a straight path *

value.halfverse: and the wonders he does for his children.
value.verse: Let them give thanks to the LORD for his mercy *

value.halfverse: and fills the hungry with good things.
value.verse: For he satisfies the thirsty *
Some sat in darkness and deep gloom, *
value.halfverse: bound fast in misery and iron;

value.verse: Because they rebelled against the words of God *
value.halfverse: and despised the counsel of the Most High.
they stumbled, and there was none to help.
value.verse: So he humbled their spirits with hard labor; *

value.halfverse: and he delivered them from their distress.
value.verse: Then they cried to the LORD in their trouble, *
He led them out of darkness and deep gloom *
value.halfverse: and broke their bonds asunder.

value.verse: Let them give thanks to the LORD for his mercy *
value.halfverse: and the wonders he does for his children.

value.verse: For he shatters the doors of bronze *
value.halfverse: and breaks in two the iron bars.
they were afflicted because of their sins.
value.verse: Some were fools and took to rebellious ways; *
They abhorred all manner of food *
value.halfverse: and drew near to death’s door.

value.verse: Then they cried to the LORD in their trouble, *
value.halfverse: and he delivered them from their distress.
and saved them from the grave.
value.verse: He sent forth his word and healed them *
Let them give thanks to the LORD for his mercy *
value.halfverse: and the wonders he does for his children.

value.verse: Let them offer a sacrifice of thanksgiving *
value.halfverse: and tell of his acts with shouts of joy.
and plied their trade in deep waters;
value.verse: Some went down to the sea in ships *

value.halfverse: and his wonders in the deep.
value.verse: They beheld the works of the LORD *

value.halfverse: which tossed high the waves of the sea.
value.verse: Then he spoke, and a stormy wind arose, *
They mounted up to the heavens and fell back to the depths; *
value.halfverse: their hearts melted because of their peril.
and were at their wits’ end.
value.verse: They reeled and staggered like drunkards *
Then they cried to the LORD in their trouble, *
value.halfverse: and he delivered them from their distress.
and quieted the waves of the sea.
value.verse: He stilled the storm to a whisper *
Then were they glad because of the calm, *
value.halfverse: and he brought them to the harbor they were bound for.
and the wonders he does for his children.
value.verse: Let them give thanks to the LORD for his mercy *
Let them exalt him in the congregation of the people *
value.halfverse: and praise him in the council of the elders.
